| HistoryText             = While in prison [[William Cross (Earth-616)|Crossfire (William Cross)]] met and befriended [[Simon Utrecht (Earth-616)|Vector (Simon Utrecht)]] of the [[U-Foes (Earth-616)|U-Foes]] whose secret power to nullify technology, he hoped to exploit. Cross was imprisoned in the [[Vault (Prison)|Vault]] where [[Rozalyn Backus (Earth-616)|Rozalyn Backus]] part of Vault's [[Guardsmen (Earth-616)|Guardsman force]]. She seemingly stopped an escape attempt by Cross and the U-Foes, but it was revealed she stole cash and goods from the criminals, including Vector's power nullification chamber.{{r|Spider-Man: Breakout #1|2}} The criminals were later transferred to the [[Raft]], and all escaped during [[Maxwell Dillon (Earth-616)|Electro's]] mass breakout, Cross worked with a team of mind-manipulators: [[Jerome Beechman (Earth-616)|Mandrill]], [[Basil Sandhurst (Earth-616)|Controller]], [[Alan Fagan (Earth-616)|Mister Fear]], and [[Jackson Day (Earth-616)|Corruptor]]. While on pursuit of Rozalyn the U-Foes and [[Crossfire's Crew]] fought a gang war until the [[New Avengers (Earth-616)|New Avengers]] stopped.{{r|Spider-Man: Breakout #3|4}} Cross and his gang were recaptured and Backus surrendered herself to the authorities.{{r|Spider-Man: Breakout #5}}
